Introduction

BOYNEXTDOOR (shortened as BND) is a six-member boy group under KOZ Entertainment (Hybe Labels). They made their official debut on May 30th with the release of the digital single "WHO!". Their official introduction is, "Who's there BOYNEXTDOOR, hi we are BOYNEXTDOOR."

The group name, "BOYNEXTDOOR," carries the meaning of approaching casually and comfortably, just like the boys next door. With this approach, they aim to express everyday stories that their peers can relate to through sincere music that seeks to create consensus with the listeners. BOYNEXTDOOR aims to establish authentic connections by sharing their experiences and emotions through their music.

The group announced their fandom name, ONEDOOR, on October 31, 2023. ONEDOOR means The fans of BOYNEXTDOOR are the only ONEDOOR that can connect BOYNEXTDOOR to the world. With ONEDOOR, BOYNEXTDOOR will open the door to the bigger world and move forward toward shared dreams and visions for the future.
